name: Ghost Stories (itch) (Synixxen)
description:
Ghost Stories is a 2D Jump and Run, in which you play the friendly ghost Nae who is looking for her memories in the home she once lived in. 
Help her collect said memories and reminiscene

Controls

Move: A and D / Left Stick (Gamepad)
Look Up: W / D-Pad
Jump: Space / South Button
Pause: ESC or P / Start

Installation Guide

1. Download the .zip file
2. Right click the folder and select 'Extract all'
3. Save the file
4. Start the .exe
5. Play :D
